short_summary: Tilting-pole Anemometer Base, Anchor Design and Construction at Kindakun Rocks North Coast British Columbia
description: Installation of a tilting pole anemometer base, anchor design and construction at Kindakun Rocks North Coast British Columbia. Including Geotechnical assessment, detailed engineered foundation drawings and installation of the anemometer tower foundation and anchors. Procurement Category/GPS 218-88 Facility Services and Constructions

full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Title: [Tilting-pole Anemometer Base, Anchor Design and Construction at Kindakun Rocks North Coast British Columbia](#title)

* **Title (English)**: Tilting-pole Anemometer Base, Anchor Design and Construction at Kindakun Rocks North Coast British Columbia.
* **Title (French)**: Base d'anémomètre à mât basculant, conception d'ancrage et construction à Kindakun Rocks sur la côte nord de la Colombie-Britannique.
* **Reference Number**: cb-776-95773127

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number**: 5000075389
* **Publication Date**: October 23, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 7, 2023 (18:00:00)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024
* **Tender Status (English)**: Expired
* **Tender Status (French)**: Expiré
* **Industry Classification**: Foundation or slab work, Specialized public building construction services, Industrial plant construction services, General building construction, Civil engineering, Structural engineering.
* **Procurement Category**: Contracting Negotiation Services (Service Contract)

### Notice

This tender announcement serves as an invitation to qualify for a contract to design and construct a foundation and anchor system for a meteorological anemometer tower at Kindakun Rocks, North Coast, British Columbia. The deadline to submit qualifications expires on November 7, 2023.

### Key Aspects of the Project

* The project involves the design and construction of a suitable foundation and anchor system for a tilting-pole anemometer tower.
* The site is located at Kindakun Rocks, North Coast, British Columbia.
* The expected completion date is March 31, 2024, with an estimated value between $100,000.00 and $150,000.00 (excluding taxes).
* No site visit is scheduled as part of this tender process.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Shawn Davis
* **Contact Title**: 
* **Contact Email**: shawn.davis@ec.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: (873) 500-0215
* **Contracting Entity**: Environment and Climate Change Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 351. boul. Saint-Joseph
